data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Crystal Palace capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
In the minute 2, Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Kevin Friend awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 8, Crystal Palace are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In London Tottenham attack through Heung Min Son. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Tottenham, close to Crystal Palace's area.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Tanguy Ndombele for Tottenham drives towards goal at Selhurst Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in London.
Sergio Reguilon (Tottenham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 20, Tottenham push upfield and Harry Kane gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Crystal Palace defence.
Free kick Tottenham.
Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 22, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Goal! Harry Kane gives Tottenham a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 23, Great play from Heung Min Son to set up the goal.
Kevin Friend signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 26, Jeffrey Schlupp gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Tottenham are coming forward and Harry Kane gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 30, Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Crystal Palace are in shooting range from this free kick.
Crystal Palace drive upfield and Eberechi Eze gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kevin Friend signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Tottenham pushes forward through Tanguy Ndombele, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Sergio Reguilon (Tottenham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace just outside Tottenham's area.
Moussa Sissoko (Tottenham) gets a yellow card.
Patrick Van Aanholt (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
Eberechi Eze (Crystal Palace) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 43, Kevin Friend awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Crystal Palace drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in London.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tottenham needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Tottenham.
In London Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke is caught offside.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 56, Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
In London Crystal Palace drive forward through Eberechi Eze. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 66, Pierre Hojbjerg of Tottenham gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
The away team have replaced Tanguy Ndombele with Giovani Lo Celso. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
In the minute 68, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Jeffrey Schlupp's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
In the minute 71, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Luka Milivojevic fires in a strike for Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Eric Dier (Tottenham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Jairo Riedewald is replacing Luka Milivojevic for the home team.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jeffrey Schlupp.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Christian Benteke's header is off-target for Crystal Palace.
In the minute 79, Kevin Friend awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace is back on the field again.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 80, Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Can Crystal Palace capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jeffrey Schlupp levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 83, Free kick Tottenham.
Tottenham drive upfield and Harry Kane gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
Jose Mourinho is making the team's second substitution at Selhurst Park with Ben Davies replacing Sergio Reguilon.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 85, Dele Alli is replacing Steven Bergwijn for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in London.
Ben Davies (Tottenham) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In London, Harry Kane (Tottenham) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Wilfried Zaha for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Eberechi Eze with Andros Townsend.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Crystal Palace will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tottenham.
In London Tottenham drive forward through Eric Dier. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Tottenham, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Tottenham!
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
